entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero with frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of wet flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
